column3:
This fixes the following travis failure:

``` py
  File "/home/travis/build/bitcoin/bitcoin/build/../qa/rpc-tests/p2p-feefilter.py", line 101, in run_test
    assert(allInvsMatch(txids, test_node))
```

Thanks for trying to fix this.  This might be good enough, but it occurred to me that in the situation where clearing the mempool is preventing the test failure we're trying to fix, it's really just covering up the fact that the test isn't exercising the code path we want to test.  \n\nThe current test failures occur when the time from mempool-acceptance-to-relay exceeds 10 seconds (which it somet
